profile_positions.description:
-System administrator for multiple POPs around the globe: New York city, Orangeburg NY , Miami FL.
-In and outside Building maintenance 
-Keep track of all the hardware stock.
-Onsite customer support.
-Keep track of all the upcoming maintenances for the local DC and worldwide POP's.
-On call weekends (and 24/7 availability for security issues at the datacenter).
-Onsite facility management.
-Monitoring with Grafana: Hot isle temp, cold isle temp, humidity, powerload, air presure, and adjust where needed.
-Installing and configuring different types of switches and servers
-Cabling of switches & servers, managing patches or creating new ones.
-Cleaning/restoring cables.
-Installation, testing, administration and delivery of cross connects (Coax, UTP, fiber).
-working with a ticket system (Netrouting,BMS for The Hague facility, Myconnectwise for Miami facility and Equinix for NY), performing work on request. 
-Performing backup and restore tasks regarding server and customer automation.
-Replacing, removing, racking and stacking of servers,racks, network hardware, switches and other hardware. 
-Leading and guiding external contractors with the (re)placement of servers and other hardware and annual maintenance.
-Writing, implementing and controlling of hardware and software installation guidelines and procedures like iLO, TCP/IP, DNS. DHCP, HTTP. 
-Registration and documentation of IT related requests, changes, incidents and outages in a dedicated task management software. 
-Solving/escalating problems, incidents and changes following SLA-agreements (with the use of task management software).
-Management of SAN and NAS configurations.
-Improving instrastructure where possible.
-Installing and maintaining PDU’s.
-Doing daily and weekly audits to be sure everything is at the highest level of performance(airco filters, UPS load and many more).
-Running/testing/checking the generator.
-Decomision of racks/servers/cables in large or small volumes.
profile_positions.title: Datacenter Operations manager

profile_positions.description:
-Installing of different types of servers: all brands.
-Installing different types of switches : Opengear, Lantronix, Juniper.
-Configuring different types of switches : Opengear, Lantronix, Juniper.
-Cabling of switches & servers and managing patches or creating new ones.
-Cleaning/restoring cable issues like broken utp/fiber .
-Only employee of riot games in The Netherlands, running ervers for complete West and East of Europe
-Installation, testing, administration and delivery of cross connects (Coax, UTP, fiber) 
-working with a ticket system, performing work on request. 
-Performing backup and restore tasks regarding server and customer automation 
-Replacing, removing, racking and stacking of servers,racks, network hardware, switches and other hardware. 
-Leading and guiding external contractors with the (re)placement of servers and other hardware .
-Writing, implementing and controlling of hardware and software installation guidelines and procedures like iLO, TCP/IP, DNS. DHCP, HTTP. 
-Registration and documentation of IT related requests, changes, incidents and outages in a dedicated task management software. 
-Solving or escalating problems, incidents and changes following SLA-agreements (with the use of task management software).
-Management of SAN and NAS configurations 
-Working night shifts and weekends.
-Improving instrastructure where possible, suggest and discuss new ideas with Amarican colleagues and improve where possible.
- Always making sure the cooling is as efficient as possible.
-Alway checking off all the servers in the hall have a green light without any errors, if an error ocures, immediatly make a not and reach out to the right person to ask for downtime an fix the issue (depending on what the issue is).
-Installing and maintaining PDU’s (multiple brands)
-Doing weekly audits to be sure everything is at the highest level of performance
-Making detailed floorplans of EU POPS
-Decomision of racks/servers/cables in large or small volumes
profile_positions.title: Senior Datacenter Engineer

Previously , Booking.com and Equinix and smaller clients for different short projects.

-	Performing backup and restore tasks regarding server and customer automation 
-	Replacing, removing, racking and stacking of servers, network hardware, switches and other hardware

Working night shifts and weekends.
